it.polimi.se2018.network

Class RemotePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.RemotePlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIPlayer, SocketPlayer

    public abstract class RemotePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that give to the player the possibility to utilize different type of connection (RMI or Socket). This class will be extended from RMI or Socket Player class. It will be essentially used as a Client Handler.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

    • Method Detail

      • sendEventToView

        public abstract void sendEventToView(EventView eventView)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote method used to send to the client an update of the game.
        Parameters:
        eventView - object that will use the client to unleash the update associated.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • ping

        public abstract void ping()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote method used to ping the client. If the remote player that will call the ping will not found the disconnection of the player will be called.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getPlayerRunning

        public boolean getPlayerRunning()
        Getter for player connection state.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • disconnect

        public abstract void disconnect()
        Method used to remove a player from the RMI server. This method will also set the playerRunning boolean to false in order to remove correctly the user.
